                    <img src="http://img.youtube.com/vi/PKbeDeu5Wbk/0.jpg" alt="" class="c-slider-nav__image">

                <span class="c-slider-nav__title">Founding Interns of League of Legends</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-slider-nav__slide">
                <div class="c-slider-nav__thumb">
                    <img src="http://img.youtube.com/vi/N44R8c_F2lI/0.jpg" alt="" class="c-slider-nav__image">
                </div>
                <span class="c-slider-nav__title">Definitely (Not) Rivals | Riot Games documentary</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-slider-nav__slide">
                <div class="c-slider-nav__thumb">
                    <img src="http://img.youtube.com/vi/l8ssa4YYfrg/0.jpg" alt="" class="c-slider-nav__image">
                </div>
                <span class="c-slider-nav__title">Interns Interviewing Interns</span>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>

    <h1 class="c-heading">
        Level up @ Riot
    </h1>

    <hr class="c-rule">

    <p class="u-text-center">
        We’re helping players connect their passions to careers in gaming. Disciplines range from Game Design to Finance, Data Science to Art, Engineering to Brand Management and all that’s inbetween. Our university programs include internships for undergraduates and graduates, talks we give on campuses around the globe, graduate research projects we conduct in the winter, and classroom takeovers.
    </p>

    <div class="o-spacer"></div>

    <section class="o-section-bg">
        <h2 class="c-heading c-heading--left c-heading--light">Work Hard, Play Hard</h2>
        <p>
            That’s how many interns describe their time at Riot, and we think that’s pretty accurate. Interns roost in most Riot offices around the world, from LAX to Berlin, where they tackle tough problems while getting to know each other over rounds of League. We believe interns deserve the full-time Rioter treatment-- the opportunity to take on meaningful problems impacting over 70 million players rather than fetching coffee.
        </p>

        <div class="o-spacer"></div>

        <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/internship-info" class="c-button">Internship Information
            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 25 25" class="c-button__icon c-icon c-icon--arrow">
                <title>play-arrow</title>
                <circle class="a" cx="12.5" cy="12.5" r="12.5"/>
                <path class="b" d="M18 13l-9 5V8z"/>
            </svg>
        </a>
    </section>

    <section class="o-section">

        <header class="o-section__header">
            <span class="o-section__top-text">Fun Fact #127</span>
            <h2 class="c-heading">All Random All Math</h2>
        </header>

        <div class="c-math-box clearfix">
            <div class="c-math-box__block">
                <div class="c-math-box__ellipse">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 18 24" class="c-math-box__icon c-icon">
                        <title>file</title>
                        <path d="M17.5 23.5H.5V.5h11l6 6v17z"/>
                        <path d="M11.5.5v6h6M4.5 7.5H9M4.5 10.5h9M4.5 13.5h9M4.5 16.5h9M4.5 19.5h9"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <div class="c-math-box__number">6K</div>
                <span class="c-math-box__text">Applications received</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-math-box__block">
                <div class="c-math-box__ellipse">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 23 23" class="c-math-box__icon c-icon">
                        <title>phone</title>
                        <path d="M8.59 6.9a2.31 2.31 0 0 0 0-3.27L6.13 1.18a2.31 2.31 0 0 0-3.27 0L1.52 2.52a3.46 3.46 0 0 0-.44 4.37 53.79 53.79 0 0 0 15 15 3.47 3.47 0 0 0 4.37-.44l1.35-1.35a2.31 2.31 0 0 0 0-3.27l-2.45-2.45a2.31 2.31 0 0 0-3.27 0l-.82.82a54.85 54.85 0 0 1-7.49-7.48z"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <div class="c-math-box__number">300</div>
                <span class="c-math-box__text">Initial phone screens</span>
            </div>
            <div class="c-math-box__block">
                <div class="c-math-box__ellipse">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="c-math-box__icon c-icon">
                        <title>person</title>
                        <path d="M12 23.5h11.5a10.14 10.14 0 0 0-1-4.06c-.75-1.49-4-2.5-8-4v-3a3.75 3.75 0 0 0 1.5-3c.5 0 1-2 0-2.5 0-.3 1.34-2.8 1-4.5-.5-2.5-7.5-2.5-8-.5-3 0-1 4.59-1 5-1 .5-.5 2.5 0 2.5a3.75 3.75 0 0 0 1.5 3v3c-4 1.5-7.25 2.51-8 4a10.14 10.14 0 0 0-1 4.06z"/>
                    </svg>
                </div>
                <div class="c-math-box__number">0.6%</div>
                <span class="c-math-box__text">Applicants accepted</span>
            </div>
        </div>

    </section>

</div>

<div class="o-container o-container--full clearfix">

    <div class="o-grid o-grid--flex">

        <div class="o-grid__column o-grid__column--6-md">
            <div class="o-section-bg o-section-bg--compact o-section-bg--alt-1">
                <h2 class="c-heading c-heading--light c-heading--spacer">Graduate Winter Project</h2>
                <hr class="c-rule">
                <p class="u-text-center">Our Graduate Winter Project invites a select number of graduate students to a Riot office to gain experience developing their business and analytical skills. It's a glimpse into the working life at Riot, so top students know what they'd be signing up for.</p>
                <p class="u-text-center">Each student team takes on the subject of a specific case study: challenging situations digging into key business decisions we face as a growing company. The small five- or six-person team learns our strategies and how we've applied them to similar problems. The objective and deliverables are set by Rioters who identify unique problem spaces for students to explore.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="o-grid__column o-grid__column--6-md">
            <div class="o-section-bg o-section-bg--compact o-section-bg--alt-2 u-text-center">
                <div class="o-section-bg__logo c-logo c-logo--ulol">
                    uLoL
                </div>
                <p><strong>More than just a game.</strong></p>
                <p class="u-text-center">University League of Legends (ULoL) is a student-led network of League of Legends players on college campuses across the U.S. and Canada. Whether you’re new to League or a seasoned Rift vet, ULoL is your place to connect with other League players, learn how and why they play, and see what they're up to when afk.</p>
                <a href="https://www.youtube.com/embed/C5eqyn_g460?autoplay=1" class="c-image-thumb js-fancybox fancybox.iframe">
                    <img src="sites/all/modules/custom/riot/university_programs/img/ulol-thumb.jpg" alt="" class="c-image-thumb__image">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 25 25" class="c-image-thumb__icon c-icon c-icon--arrow">
                        <title>play-arrow</title>
                        <circle class="a" cx="12.5" cy="12.5" r="12.5"/>
                        <path class="b" d="M18 13l-9 5V8z"/>
                    </svg>
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>

</div>

</div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>            </div>
</div>
  </div>

<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-chrome">
    <ul class="list-container">
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">1</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            No canto superior direito do seu navegador, clique no botão menu (<img alt="Chrome-menu-icon" class="browser-menu-icon" src="https://assets.r7.com/assets/schumi_core/ticker/browsers/chrome-menu-icon-3ca45250f81904d5656be601452e567b.png" />) e em seguida escolha a opção <b>Configurações</b>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">2</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>Na página aberta, em <b>Inicialização</b>, escolha <b>Abrir uma página específica ou um conjunto de páginas</b> e depois <b>Configurar páginas</b>.</p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">3</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>Na janela, digite o endereço do R7 (http://www.r7.com) no campo destacado em <b>Adicionar um nova página</b>. Clique em <b>Ok</b> para finalizar.</p>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </script>
<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-firefox">
    <ul class="list-container">
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">1</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            No canto superior direito do seu navegador, clique no botão menu (<img alt="Firefox-menu-icon" class="browser-menu-icon" src="https://assets.r7.com/assets/schumi_core/ticker/browsers/firefox-menu-icon-b0cbadb3570bb7d81cc64ef831baa760.png" />) e em seguida escolha a opção <b>Preferências.</b>
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">2</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            Na tela de preferências, em <b>Iniciar</b>, escolha <b>Abrir página inicial</b> no menu <b>Ao iniciar Firefox</b>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">3</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            No campo <b>Página inicial</b>, digite o endereço do R7 (http://www.r7.com). As preferências são salvas automaticamente.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </script>
<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" class="r7-homepage-instructions-ie">
    <ul class="list-container">
      <li class="list-item">

          </p>
        </div>
      </li>
      <li class="list-item">
        <div class="list-number">2</div>
        <div class="info">
          <p>
            Na tela aberta, na aba <b>Geral</b>, localize <b>Home Page</b> e digite o endereço do R7 (http://www.r7.com) no campo indicado.
          </p>
        </div>
      </li>

    </ul>
  </script>

</li>

<div class="ad selo-c" id="ad-selo-2">

<div class="column r7cl7 r7omega">
<div>
<div class="box rw mais_lidas" id="box_58be30a0490f8cee9300009a">
<div class="r7inner-container">
<h1 class="mais-lidas-title">
<a title="+ Lidas R7" href="http://www.r7.com/tudo-do-r7">+ Lidas R7</a>
</h1>
<div class="mais-lidas-content">
<ol>
<li class="r7cl1 r7alpha">
<span class="number">1</span>

<h6 class="r7headline">

</a>

<a href="http://www.jornalciencia.com/mulher-encontra-criatura-bizarra-de-duas-cabecas-em-seu-quintal-na-argentina-e-causa-pavor-na-web/" target="" data-headline="" mini_chamada_#{index}"" data-item="title" data-origin="title" data-headline="mini_chamada_0" data-social-headline="Causa pavor na web" data-social-lead="Mulher encontra criatura bizarra de “duas cabeças” " data-shorten="http://www.jornalciencia.com/mulher-encontra-criatura-bizarra-de-duas-cabecas-em-seu-quintal-na-argentina-e-causa-pavor-na-web/">

</a>
</p>

<h6 class="r7headline">
<a class="headline hat" href="http://www.tnh1.com.br/noticias/noticias-detalhe/futebol/com-cinco-meses-de-gravidez-assistente-vai-trabalhar-no-classico-crb-x-csa-nao-e-invalidez/?cHash=535b9307664eded622bb2478b1dc090e" target="" title='5 meses de gravidez ' data-social-headline='5 meses de gravidez ' data-social-lead='Assistente vai trabalhar emCRB x CSA' data-shorten="http://www.tnh1.com.br/noticias/noticias-detalhe/futebol/com-cinco-meses-de-gravidez-assistente-vai-trabalhar-no-classico-crb-x-csa-nao-e-invalidez/?cHash=535b9307664eded622bb2478b1dc090e">
5 meses de gravidez
</a>
</h6>
<p class="r7lead">

    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-59d0f153-03f5-9f83-03eb-7e1f722581e9">Riot Dublin took a forward leap into new digs back in 2015, when we moved into a roomier custom-built office along the River Liffey. Split across three floors, the new</span>...</p></div></div></div>  </div>

<article about="/articles/20150210/1654/brandon-beck-speaks-dice-2015" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund even clearfix" id="node-article-1654">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20150210/1654/brandon-beck-speaks-dice-2015" title="Brandon Beck speaks at DICE 2015">Brandon Beck speaks at DICE 2015</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Brandon Beck speaks at DICE 2015" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-c7626011-7649-4684-a123-13997f6e130e">Brandon Beck, Riot’s co-founder and CEO, spoke at </span><a href="http://www.dicesummit.org/" target="_blank">DICE Summit 2015</a> about the need for care and cultivation of talent in game development. In this talk, he argues...</p></div></div></div>  </div>

e=h.info=NREUM.info,n=d.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];if(setTimeout(s.abort,3e4),!(e&&e.licenseKey&&e.applicationID&&n))return s.abort();c(y,function(n,t){e[n]||(e[n]=t)}),f("mark",["onload",a()+h.offset],null,"api");var t=d.createElement("script");t.src="https://"+e.agent,n.parentNode.insertBefore(t,n)}}function o(){"complete"===d.readyState&&i()}function i(){f("mark",["domContent",a()+h.offset],null,"api")}function a(){return E.exists&&performance.now?Math.round(performance.now()):(u=Math.max((new     <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Rioters Connect with Players at PAX East</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20140409/1228/rioters-connect-players-pax-east" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sdowney odd clearfix" id="node-article-1228">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Rioters Connect with Players at PAX East" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 04-09-14</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20140409/1228/rioters-connect-players-pax-east">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20140409/1228/rioters-connect-players-pax-east">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/Pax_main.png?itok=I2d4ceBD" width="700" height="300" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-499b-3551-1e1e-e209c42ccee4">Like a Lovecraftian leviathan rising from Boston harbor, PAX East -- Penny Arcade&rsquo;s gaming and geek culture convention, running from April 11 - 13 -- is nearly upon us. We&rsquo;re holding down trusty booth #424 over at the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, so swing by and join us for more community events than Cthulhu has tentacles on his gross face.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-499b-3551-1e1e-e209c42ccee4">These community events include no-holds-barred </span><em>League</em> matches between players and Rioters, live art demos, cosplay showcases, design Q&amp;A sessions, an in-depth presentation on the making of the<a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0nlJuwO0GDs" target="_blank"> &ldquo;Get Jinxed&rdquo;</a> music video, and some very special <em>League</em> community guest appearances.</p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-499b-3551-1e1e-e209c42ccee4">We&rsquo;re also hosting panels all con long where we hope to connect with players and start conversations about how we approach game design, the </span><em>League</em> community, and our champion relaunch process. To get a full look at Riot&rsquo;s PAX East panels, cast your gaze below:</p>
<ul dir="ltr">
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-493a-ddd3-788d-b19d0df9198c"><a href="http://east.paxsite.com/schedule/panel/connecting-and-supporting-the-league-of-legends-community" target="_blank">Connecting and Supporting the<em> League of Legends </em>Community</a></span> &ndash; Friday, April 11 from 2:30 pm &ndash; 3:30 pm, Dragonfly Theater</li>
</ul>
<p class="rteindent1"><span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-493a-ddd3-788d-b19d0df9198c">At Riot Games, no day goes by that we&#39;re not blown away by actions and interactions of the </span><em>League of Legends </em>community. From collegiate clubs to cosplayers, from streamers to artists, from fan sites to tournament organizers, the community&#39;s taken the stage to expand and redefine the <em>League of Legends</em> experience for everyone. In this panel, we&rsquo;ll discuss how we challenge the conventions of traditional PR and Community disciplines to build a different kind of relationship with players.</p>
<ul dir="ltr">
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-493a-ddd3-788d-b19d0df9198c"><a href="http://east.paxsite.com/schedule/panel/the-art-of-relaunching-champions-in-league-of-legends" target="_blank">The Art of Relaunching Champions in <em>League of Legends</em></a></span> &ndash; Saturday, April 12 from 2:30 pm &ndash; 3:30 pm, Dragonfly Theater</li>
</ul>
<p class="rteindent1" dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-493a-ddd3-788d-b19d0df9198c">With each new champion, Riot Games continuously strives to level up its quality bar. But what about older champions? Enter Riot&rsquo;s Champion Relaunch team. Dedicated to quality and consistency, the team reforges classic <em>League of Legends</em> champions with new designs. Join the Relaunch team as we discuss the philosophy and technical approach behind the delicate task of reimagining older champions.</span></p>
<ul dir="ltr">
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-493a-ddd3-788d-b19d0df9198c"><a href="http://east.paxsite.com/schedule/panel/inside-look-at-game-design-for-league-of-legends" target="_blank">Inside Look at Game Design for <em>League of Legends</em></a></span> &ndash; Sunday, April 13 from 2:30 pm &ndash; 3:30 pm, Dragonfly Theater</li>
</ul>
<p class="rteindent1" dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-026749fd-493a-ddd3-788d-b19d0df9198c">Creating and maintaining competitive gameplay in <em>League of Legends</em> requires consistent attention to things like champion design, healthy gameplay, and building effective design communication with players. Join designers from Riot Games as we discuss how to create an engaging and satisfying gameplay experience in <em>League of Legends</em>.</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"></nav>

      </div>
</article>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>

      <div class="view view-related-articles view-id-related_articles view-display-id-block view-dom-id-2d2b482e3bb6c741c77a6627b23e562a">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-empty">
      <div class="view view-featured-news-blocks view-id-featured_news_blocks view-display-id-block news-grid view-dom-id-43f3facee3cbf075478f0edab395d18b">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article new-tag-item view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">
	<a class="news-teaser" href="/articles/20170315/2390/designing-experiences-beyond-game" title="Designing Experiences Beyond the Game"><span class="glass"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails-grey/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/demacia-silvermere_newsriver.jpg?itok=tb8y7tAE" width="400" height="400" alt="" /></span><span class="base"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/demacia-silvermere_newsriver.jpg?itok=oyDXNuyv" width="400" height="400" alt="" /></span><span class="teaser-meta"><span class="headline">Designing Experiences Beyond the Game</span></span></a></div>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
    
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article new-tag-item view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-a8b2dea3-0f60-4f0c-8a74-f09a14731caa');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 17:27:31 --></html>
